skills.name: Trickster
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns. This attack will deal more damage according to your Attack Speed.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%

Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Song of the Night Wind
skills.description: Increases the Attack Speed and Critical Rate of all allies for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Increase CRI Rate
skill_effect.description: Critical Hit Rate is increased by 30%

skills.name: The Night's Comfort (Passive)
skills.description: If the turn ends without attacking any enemy, a shield that is proportionate to your level and lasts for 3 turns is generated. While having the shield, all damage you deal is increased by 50%. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage
